QuestData.Title: Security!
QuestData.Description: It's not as like I haven't got enough to think about here!$b$bKeeping this place operational is hard enough without constant elf and draenei harassment.$b$bNow, on top of everything, there's an assassin lurking around the camp who's killed an important diplomat... on my watch!$b$bWhoever it is couldn't have gotten far, $c. Scour the camp until you find her and then avenge the diplomat!$b$bAt least I can bring the assassin's head with me when I have to answer to Hellscream.
QuestData.LogDescription: Overseer Gorthak wants you to bring him the Kaldorei Assassin's Head.
QuestData.CompletionText: I want to know one thing, $r.$b$bIs that assassin dead?
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $c.$b$bOne last request - it would probably be best if none of my laborers knew this assassin ever existed.
